title: Play/Pause Flash icons
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game in the mlb.tv player

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user presses the Pause button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the pause icon will appear in the middle of the screen then disappear after a few seconds
AND the feed will pause

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user presses the Play button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the play icon will appear in the middle of the screen then disappear after a few seconds
AND the feed will play

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the controls are present on bottom of the screen
AND the scrubber is in focus
AND the video is playing
AND the user hits the center button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the pause icon will appear in the middle of the screen then disappear after a few seconds
AND the feed will pause

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the controls are present on bottom of the screen
AND the scrubber is in focus
AND the video is paused
AND the user hits the center button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the play icon will appear in the middle of the screen then disappear after a few seconds
AND the feed will play

title: Jump to Live Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a live game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the feed is not at the live point
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see a Jump to live quick action button (it should be to the left of the CC button and have a semicircular arrow icon)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the cursor is on the Jump to Live icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see "Jump to Live" text above the icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the Jump to Live icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed should advance to the live point

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the feed is at the live point
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Jump to live icon is no longer visible
AND the live indicator is red

title: FF/RW Pill UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game feed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user presses the RW/FF button on an archived game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a pill should appear above the dot on the scrubber
AND the team logos should appear in the pill 
AND the score should appear in the pill and update as the user moves through the scrubber
AND the time will appear above the scrubber and update as the user moves through the scrubber
AND innings outs will appear below the scrubber and update as the user moves through the scrubber

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user presses the RW/FF button on a live game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a pill should appear above the dot on the scrubber
AND the team logos should appear in the pill 
AND the score should appear in the pill and update as the user moves through the scrubber
AND the time will appear above the scrubber and update as the user moves through the scrubber
AND innings outs will appear below the scrubber and update as the user moves through the scrubber

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the stream rewinds to the beginning of the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the rewind will stop 
AND the regular scrubber ui will return

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the stream fast forwards to the end of the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the fast forward will stop 
AND the regular scrubber ui will return

title: Inning markers with Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user with Hide Spoilers set to ON

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views an archived game started from the home page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no inning milestones will display to the right of the scrubber bar location indicator (after the current point being viewed in the game)
AND inning milestones will display to the left of the scrubber bar location indicator (for portions of the game which have already been viewed)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views an archived game started from the games page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no inning milestones will display to the right of the scrubber bar location indicator (after the current point being viewed in the game)
AND inning milestones will display to the left of the scrubber bar location indicator (for portions of the game which have already been viewed)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views a live game started from the home page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no inning milestones will display to the right of the scrubber bar location indicator (after the current point being viewed in the game)
AND inning milestones will display to the left of the scrubber bar location indicator (for portions of the game which have already been viewed)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views a live game started from the games page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no inning milestones will display to the right of the scrubber bar location indicator (after the current point being viewed in the game)
AND inning milestones will display to the left of the scrubber bar location indicator (for portions of the game which have already been viewed)

title: FF/RW archived game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching an archived game in the mlbtv player

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user hits the FF/RW (or left/right) button once
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the player skips forward/back 10 seconds
AND the player plays at the new location after the button is released

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user holds the FF/RW (or left/right) button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the player continues to move forward/back
AND for each second the user hold the button the speed increases
AND the speed at which the player is FF/RWing is indicated by a number beside the double arrows below the scrubber
AND the max speed indicator is 5

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user holds the FF/RW (or left/right) button
AND then releases the button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the player plays at the new location after the button is released

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user holds the RW (or left) button
AND the scrubber returns all the way to the beginning of the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the RW action will stop
AND the player will resume playing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user holds the FF (or right) button
AND the scrubber returns all the way to the end of the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the FF action will stop
AND the app will return to the location from which the game was launched OR the video will remain paused at then end of the feed

title: FF/RW live game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a live game in the mlbtv player

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user hits the FF/RW (or left/right) button once
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the player skips forward/back 10 seconds
AND the player plays at the new location after the button is released

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user holds the FF/RW (or left/right) button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the player continues to move forward/back
AND for each second the user hold the button the speed increases
AND the speed at which the player is FF/RWing is indicated by a number beside the double arrows below the scrubber
AND the max speed indicator is 5

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user holds the FF/RW (or left/right) button
AND then releases the button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the player plays at the new location after the button is released

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user holds the FF (or right) button
AND the scrubber returns all the way to the live point in the game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the FF action will stop
AND the player will resume playing at the live point

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user holds the RW (or left) button
AND the scrubber returns all the way to the beginning of the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the RW action will stop
AND the player will resume playing

title: Broadcast Options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user watching a feed in the MLB tv player
AND the feed is playing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user presses down to access the tab menu
AND selects BROADCAST OPTIONS
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the available tv feeds will be displayed
AND the current video and audio feeds will display as selected
AND the audio feed options associated with the video that is playing will be displayed to the right of the video options

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to specific feeds
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a white background color will indicate that the feed is in focus

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects an alternate audio feeed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the alternate audio will play without affecting video playback

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the alternate video feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the alternate video will play from the same point in the game with the associated audio

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has changed to the alternate video feed
AND the user selects BROADCAST OPTIONS
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the audio feed options associated with the new video that is playing will be displayed to the right of the video options

title: Video Options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user watching a game in the mlbtv player
AND the user selects BROADCAST OPTIONS

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes the video options
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see team logo, team short name, and broadcast name (eg. Logo PHI - NBCSP)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes the video options
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the home feed will be listed first, followed by the away feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user observes the video options
AND the feed is a national feed
NOTE:Sample national feeds- 
HOU @ TEX April 7, 2024 ESPN game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will see the broadcast logo instead of the team logo

title: Video Options- Unentitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user watching an mlb tv feed in the player (a single team user would be easiest for testing purposes for this test case)
AND the user select BROADCAST options
custom_steps: WHEN the user is not entitled to the feed
custom_expected: THEN The user will see the feed as normal in the broadcast options (or feed select modal) with a lock icon on the un-entitled feed, and the user will not be able to select it.

title: Broadcast Options- Audio Options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user watching a game in the mlbtv player
AND the user selects BROADCAST OPTIONS

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes the Audio Options
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the audio options should follow the format Team Logo - Broadcast name - Language (Eg. Logo NBCSP - Spanish (Language is only listed when Spanish))

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user observes the Audio Options
AND there are more than 2 audio options available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the audio options appear in a grid with 2 options in each column

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user observes the Audio Options
AND the feed is a national feed
NOTE:Sample national feeds- 
April 7, 2024 HOU @ TEX
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a headphone icon should display instead of the Team logo

title: Back press after switching feeds
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game with multiple feeds in the MLB app
custom_steps:
WHEN the use switches feeds
AND then presses the back button
custom_expected: THEN the app will redirect out of the player and back to the location from which the game was launched

title: Resume after backgrounding app
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is watching a game in the app
AND the user backgrounds the app
AND then the user reopens the app
custom_expected:
THEN the feed should resume
AND the audio options should persist if changed from the default feed

title: Resume at start after game watched to completion
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game has been watched to completion
AND the game is archived
AND the user chooses to resume the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game will start at the beginning

title: Outside audio app stops when video plays
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user playing audio from an outside app (eg Spotify)
custom_steps:
WHEN they enter the MLB app
AND play a video
custom_expected:
THEN the outside audio should stop
AND the audio associated with the MLB app video should play

title: Closed Captions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game feed in the MLB app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user hits a a navigation button on the control (ie up button)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the player controls will be visible
AND a CC button will be visible over the scrubber controls if CC is available for the given game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates the focus to the CC button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN "Turn CC On" or "Turn CC Off" text will appear above the button (depending on what is saved in the user's profile service)
AND the button will highlight white to indicate focus

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN CC is off
AND the user clicks the CC button while it is in focus
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the messaging above the button will change to "Turn CC Off"
AND closed captioning will start displaying in the game feed shortly after

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN CC is on
AND the user clicks the CC button while it is in focus
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the messaging above the button will change to "Turn CC On"
AND closed captioning will stop displaying in the game feed

title: Resume a live game after exiting
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user selects a live feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be shown options to "Watch Live" or "Watch from The Beginning"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "Watch Live"options
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will play from the live point

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the back button to leave the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be returned to the part of the app from which they accessed the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the game again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be shown options to "Resume", "Watch Live", or "Watch from the Beginning"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "Resume" option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be returned to the bookmarked position from when they left the game before (not the live point)

title: Metadata display
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching an mlb.tv game in the player

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the controls/scrubber come up on the screen
AND the submenu is NOT active
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN metadata will appear in the top left of the screen
AND metadata includes Team logos and  colors
AND metadata includes team three letter abbreviation
AND metadata includes start time
AND metadata includes call letters of video feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the controls/scrubber come up on the screen
AND the submenu is active
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the metadata will no longer be presented on the screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the controls/scrubber are dismissed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the metadata will no longer be presented on the screen

title: Quick actions not visible when user navigates to submenu
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game in the mlb tv player
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the submenu (Details/broadcasts section)
custom_expected: THEN the quick actions buttons (CC, Watch Live, above the scrubber) are not visible

title: Details/Linescore- Archived Game- Hide Spoilers On
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user watching an archived game in the MLB TV player
AND hide spoilers is set to ON

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates down to the details tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the space below will initially populate with 9 innings of a blank linescore
AND a loading graphic displays for team icons
AND a loading graphic displays for Now Batting
AND a loading graphic displays for Pitching section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the data loads
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN inning data will populate the linescore up to the point to which the user has navigated within the feed
AND the Pitcher and Now Batting icons will correspond with current players in those spots in the game
AND Pitcher and Now Batting data will correspond with current players in those spots in the game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates to a half inning
AND the user selects it with a click
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the stream will navigate to the half inning selected
AND play from that point

title: Details/Linescore- Archived Game Hide Spoilers Off
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user watching an archived game in the MLB TV player
AND Hide Spoilers is off

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates down to the details tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the space below will initially populate with 9 innings of a blank linescore
AND a loading graphic displays for team icons
AND a loading graphic displays for Now Batting
AND a loading graphic displays for Pitching section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the data loads
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN all inning data will populate the linescore
AND the Pitcher and Now Batting icons will correspond with current players in those spots in the game
AND Pitcher and Now Batting data will correspond with current players in those spots in the game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates to a half inning
AND the user selects it with a click
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the stream will navigate to the half inning selected
AND play from that point

title: Details/Linescore-  Error loading data
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game in the MLB TV player

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates down to the details tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the space below will initially populate with 9 innings of a blank linescore
AND a loading graphic displays for team icons
AND a loading graphic displays for Now Batting
AND a loading graphic displays for Pitching section

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN data fails to load
(This can be simulated by blocking https://statsapi.mlb.com:443/*?* AFTER selecting the feed from the feed select modal but before the data is captured and then waiting for a bit for the details call to fail)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the loading graphics will continue to display
AND the video will remain playable

title: Details/Linescore- Live Game- Hide Spoilers On
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user watching a live game in the MLB TV player
AND Hide Spoilers is set to Off

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates down to the details tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the space below will initially populate with 9 innings of a blank linescore
AND a loading graphic displays for team icons
AND a loading graphic displays for Now Batting
AND a loading graphic displays for Pitching section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the data loads
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN inning data will populate the linescore up to the point to which the user has navigated within the feed
AND the Pitcher and Now Batting icons will correspond with current players in those spots in the game
AND Pitcher and Now Batting data will correspond with current players in those spots in the game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN viewing a live game 
AND the user scrolls into the details tab
AND the user navigates into the innings section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the current inning being viewed should be highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates to a half inning
AND the user selects it with a click
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the stream will navigate to the half inning selected
AND play from that point

title: Details/Linescore- Live Game- Hide Spoilers Off
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user watching a live game in the MLB TV player
AND Hide Spoilers is set to Off

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates down to the details tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the space below will initially populate with 9 innings of a blank linescore
AND a loading graphic displays for team icons
AND a loading graphic displays for Now Batting
AND a loading graphic displays for Pitching section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the data loads
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN inning data will populate the linescore up to the live point
AND the Pitcher and Now Batting icons will correspond with current players at the user's current position in the stream
AND Pitcher and Now Batting data will correspond with current players in those spots in the game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN viewing a live game 
AND the user scrolls into the details tab
AND the user navigates into the innings section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the current inning being viewed should be highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates to a half inning
AND the user selects it with a click
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the stream will navigate to the half inning selected
AND play from that point

title: Details/Linescore- Extra Innings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user watching a game in the MLB TV player
AND the game includes extra innings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the details section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN chevrons will appear in the linescore area to allow the user to see that extra innings exist

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates in the direction of the chevrons after reaching the end of available innings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN one inning at a time will be revealed in the direction chosen with each click

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects a half inning
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the media will navigate to that inning and continue playing at that point

title: Details/Linescore- 7 inning games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is watching a game that was finished early (7 innings)
Example games that can be used to test this use case- 
NEU @ BOS on 02/23/2024
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Details tab
custom_expected:
THEN unplayed innings do not show scores (ie innings 8 & 9)
AND the unplayed innings are not focusable or clickable
